chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 is having the following issue:
The package was never delivered, I never signed for it and it's marked as delivering on Saturday at 18.
Thank you for your help,

Hi there,

The recipient of this order claims they haven't received it, even though the tracking shows up as delivered. 

We have asked the customer to look for their package in case it was delivered to a neighbor or family member. If they can't find the package, we asked them to provide the Certificate of Non-receipt and their ID.

Please send us a Proof of Delivery (POD) with the customer's signature, a photo of the package being handed to the customer, or a screenshot showing the GPS location of the delivery, within 2 business days. 

Please note: any other POD will not be considered relevant (ie: unsigned document or unclear photo).

If a POD is provided, a police report will be required from the customer to process the claim. --- ONLY FOR ORDERS OF IPHONES 12/13/14 (to remove) --- Only reports requiring the customer to go to the police station will be accepted.---

Thanks for your help.

Looking forward to hearing from you,
Alice, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We have informed our logistics partner about this situation and requested for the POD. 

Regards,
SY

Dear Backcare,

Attached is the POD. Kindly do not refund the customer, thank you.

Regards,
YR

Hi!

The package has not yet been successfully delivered and all the requirements for a refund, as described in our lost package policy, have been met. 

All necessary documents have been shared in this SA:
- Certificate of non-acceptance
- identification
- police report signed

You will find the documents in the "details" section of this SAV. 
You can use them to investigate the matter with your carrier.

Please send a tracking link for a replacement within 1 business day or this order will be refunded.

You can now block the device remotely, if possible.

All the best,
Alice, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

The CND submitted is invalid because the tracking number 10694000238506 and address name are missing. Kindly assist the customer in filling those up. Meanwhile, we have contacted our logistics partner about the issue. Thank you for your cooperation.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

Please ask the customer to also fill up the CND of DPD I have attached.

Regards,
KJ

CND of DPD.

Please send a tracking link for a replacement today or this order will be refunded.

You can now block the device remotely, if possible.

All the best,
Alice, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

I have sent the CND to our logistics partner. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you for your patience and understanding.

Regards,
CH

Dear Backcare,

The DPD's CND is invalid because the customer needs to sign at the right place and write his name above the signature. Kindly assist the customer in doing so, otherwise we will not be able to proceed with the investigation. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

Please do not refund customers until we have confirmed that the documents are in order. The CND is not signed properly. We are unable to continue with investigations if we do not have the relevant documents. 

Please ask the customer to sign at the right place and write his name above the signature.

Regards,
RK
